General.Name: DRGEM Corporation
General.Description: DRGEM Corporation manufactures and sells diagnostic radiography systems. It offers high frequency X-ray generators; conventional and digital radiography systems; and ACQUIDOR, a digital imaging system. DRGEM Corporation exports its products to approximately 150 countries. The company is headquartered in Gwangmyeong, South Korea.
General.Address: E-B/D Gwangmyeong Techno-Park, Gwangmyeong-si, South Korea, 14322
